import math
t=input()
while t>0:
    n=input()
    a=[]
    for x in raw_input().split():
        a.append(int(x))
    a.sort()
    n=int(math.ceil(n/2.0))
    res=a[n:]
    a=a[:n]
    count=1
    for x in res:
        a.insert(count,x)
        count+=2
    for x in a:
        print x,
    print ''
    t-=1
